p: The chemical composition of T. procumbens essential oil indicated the presence of 20 compounds in total. The major compounds are thymol, Î³-terpinene, and o-cymene in its composition. The EO presented antioxidant activity by the DPPH radical capture method at the highest concentrations; however, it presents low activity when compared to ascorbic acid. It also presented low toxicity to A. salina, serving as a preliminary analysis of the possible low toxicity of the species to the environment and to humans.
